text: Peripheral blood monocytes ( PBM ) or THP-1 cells were incubated in the presence or absence of carrageenan for 24 h before being stained for various cell surface antigens .
Antigen expression was then analyzed by flow cytometry .
A : Histograms of <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression in cells treated with medium only ( control ) , 10 kDa dCGN ( C10 ) , or 40 kDa dCGN ( C40 ) .
